mapper.select: SELECT q.question_no questionNo , q.test_no testNo , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle , p.student_no studentNo , p.paper_no paperNo , p.answer answer FROM question q inner JOIN paper p ON q.question_no = p.question_no WHERE q.test_no = #{testNo} AND p.student_no = #{studentNo} ORDER BY q.question_no ASC

SELECT q.question_no questionNo , q.test_no testNo , e.example_no exampleNo , e.example_idx exampleIdx , e.example_title exampleTitle , e.example_ox exampleOx FROM question q INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no WHERE q.test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY example_idx ASC
SELECT question_no questionNo , test_no testNo , question_idx questionIdx , question_title questionTitle FROM question WHERE test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY question_no ASC
